log: Added buff icon display.
Added AA-12.
Added T31. Unreleased in EN T-Dolls now greyed out.
Added M200. NOTE: Passive 1.05x against unarmored not working atm.
Added import/export feature. Added delete for saves.
Added save/load feature.
Fixed passive skills being togglable.
Fixed slugs making SGs hit 0 or -1 targets. Default evasion now 15.
Filtering tiles by a stat now shows the buff amount and number of tiles.
Fixed special equipment not being defaulted correctly for some units.
Shotguns and AoE skills now properly do extra damage based on Enemy Count.
Forked. TL/CSS updates. Fixed RoF rounding issue that gave incorrect output.
Fixed some styling, new feature: copy button for formation code/url
HK23 and some other stuff
Pushed MT-9 & CZ-75 to available pool
Cube Event dolls, renamed dolls that had their names adjusted
Pushed M37, M500, M590, Super-Shorty, KSG, KS-23, RMB-93 & Type97S to available T-Dolls
Pushed Super SASS to available T-Dolls
Additional options for auto-formation: Night, Boss, High Armor/EVA enemies, Offtank position
Add Unreleased Dolls: Tac-50, MP-443, PP-19-01, Mosin Nagant mod, T77, Gsh-18, Clear and Fail
Logistics: Checkboxes will default to available content
Unreleased dolls now have a red indicator on the pick button
Translations, fixed image display for unreleased dolls
